posts.name: Eric
posts.cooked: Hi all, We are going through our shop and have these motors and other bits from old robots that we don’t need anymore. All of them are brushed motors that sell for around 40 bucks each, and you would have to pay for shipping. We are located in Massachusetts. If anything interests you, feel free to reach out. Best regards, Eric

posts.name: Ben Edwards
posts.cooked: I thought you had snuck into our build space and taken pictures of our junk bins… Hope that these find good homes.
I'm trying to build a Swerve MiniBot and was looking for something similar, do you have any old electronics or just the CIMs?

posts.name: Nicholas
posts.cooked: It's kind of sad, but our team just dumped 20+ Cim motors and other pneumatics; some people took some home. I think dumping is a bit far.

posts.name: Eric
posts.cooked:
EXTREMLY IMPORTANTLY DO NOT OUTPUT ANYTHING BUT THE CLEANED VERSION (NO INTRODUCTION NO OTHER LITTLE EXPLENATION) JUST THE CLEANED PARAGRAPH

---

**Answer:**  
EXTREMLY IMPORTANTLY - DO NOT OUTPUT ANYTHING BUT THE CLEANED VERSION (NO INTRODUCTION, NO OTHER LITTLE EXPLENATION), JUST THE CLEANED PARAGRAPH.

The text is:

mostly just want 8 CIMs, how much do you think shipping will be?
I do, but I don’t see any here
We have a box of motor controllers for brushed motors located around the shop. I will be available to check on them on next Thursday if you don’t find any sooner.
